thread.title: Personal little Minions, Airwheel 2 wheel self balancing Electric Scooter
thread.title_full: Personal little Minions, Airwheel 2 wheel self balancing Electric Scooter

title: Personal little Minions, Airwheel 2 wheel self balancing Electric Scooter
text: Personal little Minions, Airwheel 2 wheel self balancing Electric Scooter The famous movie Despicable Me is very famous around the world, the adorable and smart little Minions are soon became the best friend of most of the children. Their parents are so happy to see it. Airwheel electric scooters can also try to be the personal minions. USA, 5 October 2015 -- Recently, many people talk about a very adorable little cartoon characters, the Minions in the famous 3D computer-animated comedy film Despicable Me which is first produced in the year of 2010 American and is the representative animated movie of the company Universal Pictures. The famous movie Despicable Me is very famous around the world, the adorable and smart little Minions are soon became the best friend of most of the children. Their parents are so happy to see it. Airwheel electric scooters can also try to be the personal minions.Minions are the main characteristic in the movie. They are adorable,simple and honest .honestly, there are so many types of Minions, which is just like various type of scooters. Airwheel X3 single-wheeled self-balancing electric scooter is a strong hero of the scooter. It can bear the load of 120kg. Besides, the max speed of the scooter can reach 18km/h and the range can even reach 23km. The Airwheel self-balancing electric scooters are exclusively equipped with the imported lithium electric batteries which can provide strong electricity support for your riding. What is more special is that the Airwheel electric unicycle is also very colorful that can meet all the different needs of the riders. The S3 scooter is a kind of hi-tech product which is full of sense of design and technology both in appearance and in the core configuration. For the appearance of the scooter, the polymer Nano material is adopted to make the scooter strong and light. Besides, the Airwheel adopts the imported SONY battery core with original packaging, which makes sure the strong and powerful driving force. The Airwheel S3 electric scooter is not only very portable but also very excellent in performance. Like the minions are the capable and adorable assistant of their master, Airwheel can offer the rider the everlasting abilities. # # #
